nodes.text: Neeka Z'all was a female Rodian who lived on Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

By the time of the Battle of Yavin, Neeka Z'all was a child who lived on Corellia with her parents Zorgom and Norith Z'all. At some point, Neeka and her family were captured by Faye Patrick who sold them to the Corellian slavers. The Z'all family was enslaved in the Corellian Slaver Bunker near Tyrena. Circa 1 ABY, Zorgom and Norith managed to escape the bunker, along with a group of slaves led by Kyran Silene. Unfortunately, they lost Neeka in the escape and the girl was catch up. The escaped slaved did not reach Tyrena and established a camp in the wilderness. After her parents escaped, Neeka was removed from general population and put in a disciplinary cell. A spacer recruited by Kyran Silene's wife later arrived at the camp of the escaped slaves. The spacer planed to infiltrate the bunker to find evidence of the slaver operations for the Corellian Security Force. The spacer also met Zorgom and Norith Z'all and agreed to rescue their daughter while going to the bunker. With the help of the slave Gordo Zek, the spacer was able to find Neeka Z'all and helped her to escape the bunker. The child later returned to her parents.

Neeka Z'all was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Neeka Z'all was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
